summary: FAULTY INGINTION COILS, TWO OUT OF FOUR HAVE BEEN REPLACE ON 2003 VW PASSAT 1.8L T    THE REAMINING TWO ARE BOUND TO FAIL, BUT VW WILL NOT COVER THE COST OF REPLACING THEM.  THIS IS VERY CONCERNING, GIVEN THE FACT THAT THIS CAR WAS BOUGHT IN DEC 2002 AND ONLY HAS 2000 MILES, AND WHEN THE PROBLEM OCCURS THE CAR LOSES POWER AND MUST BE TOWED TO A DEALERSHIP.  NOTE LOSING POWER ON THE HIGHWAY, IN THE MIDDLE OF THE COLDEST WINTER IN NEW ENGLAND IS NOT A PLEASENT THOUGHT!!
